title: MESMERIC INDUCTIONS WITH THE POWER OF THE GAZE!
description:
Rejane is a student of Dr. Marco Paret and today she is a professional hypnotherapist. In this video she demonstrates the incredible power of the gaze with the technique of Fascination. She was able to hypnotize other students, that participated in Dr. Paret's masterclass. They entered in a deep states of Mesmeric inductions. The results were deeply transforming and long lasting. Through the whole non-verbal hypnotic experience, Rejane didn't use any words. Learn the most powerful non-verbal hypnosis techniques in Dr. Marco Paret's school. You can also organize a course in your country or a VIP group for selected few with the participation of Dr. Paret.
Check our free course on www.mesmerism.info

Dr. Marco Paret is the world's leading authority in Non-Verbal Hypnotism.
